sys_ui_message.message: As the covid-19 cases have reached to its highest peak, so is the concern of every individual to avail basic necessities for health care. The requirement is to access all medical facilities ensuring safer delivery. The Mini-Project idea is to build an application where- 1-User can request medical services like covid-19 testing facility (Pathology & Home Sample Collection), RT-PCR testing (Authorized Test Centers) 2-According to the condition of their health, users can request for Home Isolation Care Package, Home Oxygen Concentrator Support, availability of beds in hospital, delivery of food packages to their homes, delivery of medicines based on their medical reports. 3-The users will be provided with services based on the priority of their request and their health condition.
